*div1 type="summary"* *p*Troubles of DeWitt's colonists with Martin De Leon.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*person_mentioned**location_mentioned*Labaca*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-11-1826">11. Nov. 1826*/date_mentioned* 2 O'clock p. m.—*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Dear *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned**/person_mentioned*
*person_mentioned*I have just Rd and read your of the *date_mentioned n="11-08-1826">8th*/date_mentioned* Inst by *person_mentioned*Mr. Brackin*/person_mentioned*. I am confined to my Pallet, and have been for several Days given out by the *person_mentioned*spectators*/person_mentioned*—I am now on the mend and by being proped up etc. I have undertaken to write, I have 6 large blisters all raw and runing yellow matter etc.*/person_mentioned*
*p*I came here with my Cart, *person_mentioned*black man*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*two white strange Gent*/person_mentioned*, who overtook me on the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned*, on the evenig of—*date_mentioned n="11-01-1826">1st*/date_mentioned*—found all well, and in good spirits—In a few minutes a man by the name of *person_mentioned*Smith*/person_mentioned* came under whip, from the *location_mentioned*Guadaloupe*/location_mentioned* who stated that *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*son*/person_mentioned* were a Coming with the *person_mentioned*indians*/person_mentioned* to cut of the *person_mentioned*white people*/person_mentioned* as far as the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned*—It would far exceed the limits of a letter to detail all he said in relation to *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned*s threats and those of his son *person_mentioned*fernander*/person_mentioned*. in fact they were alarming as a *person_mentioned*person*/person_mentioned* (Unknown to me tho said to be respectable) has as I am informed by the *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned* here made Oath that *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned* had lured the *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned* to come and Kill all the *person_mentioned*Americans*/person_mentioned* here, and *person_mentioned*Mrs. Trudeau*/person_mentioned* has told me that she hirself will swear that she several times heard *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned* aver that he would have *person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned*s head and that he would take it tied to his saddle to the *person_mentioned*Guadaloupe*/person_mentioned*—The many threats; the manner in which they came here; and the *person_mentioned*persons */person_mentioned*who made Those threats Gave alarme to the *person_mentioned*new settlers*/person_mentioned* here and altho I myself are not easily alarmed yet I confess that I scarcely new what to be about;—There was no order made to fire from our *location_mentioned*station */location_mentioned*untill we were first fired on.*/p*
*p*About this time I went to *person_mentioned*Smith*/person_mentioned* and asked him many questions etc. he then told me that *person_mentioned*Moncholes*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Labihia*/location_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*troops*/person_mentioned* were coming on with *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned*,—I then told the *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* and all the *person_mentioned*people*/person_mentioned* that would hear me that there was no danger, and that I knew that no *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned* were coming and that I felt confident the *person_mentioned*commendant*/person_mentioned* had orders from *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*etc but the people were still alarmed. *person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned* Often told them they must not oppose Govt and that all orders coming from Govt must and should be obeyed, for fear some accident might happen I took a *person_mentioned*few men*/person_mentioned* in the night and went Some Distance along the road in order to meet the *person_mentioned*Commendant*/person_mentioned* and to inform him the news that we had, heard, and that the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*here were afraid he was coming to put them to death without mercy etc When the evening Star Disappeared I came back and again told the *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* there was no danger and for them to be at rest, that I knew *person_mentioned*Mr. Moncholes*/person_mentioned* to be an *person_mentioned*officer, of the Govt*/person_mentioned* and a Gent, and I then went to sleep for the ballance of the night. In the *date_mentioned n="11-02-1826">morning */date_mentioned*the order again was given by the *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* for no man to fire on or offer to fire, without we were first fired on. I and the *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* went down the *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned* to select a place for my *location_mentioned*camp*/location_mentioned*—when we had got a short distance, a *person_mentioned*boy*/person_mentioned* came on horse back and told us the *person_mentioned*indians*/person_mentioned* were coming—we returned on the way to the *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*when the *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* Asked me to go and meet the *person_mentioned*Commendant*/person_mentioned* and having my gun, I set it down by a tree and went on foot as fast as I could to meet the *person_mentioned*troop*/person_mentioned* (*person_mentioned*Several men*/person_mentioned* from the *location_mentioned*Station */location_mentioned*followed me with their ares [arms?]who layed them down and wished I would let them to go with me) which I refused to do and told them as they were *person_mentioned*strangers */person_mentioned*etc to go back; that the *person_mentioned*Commendant*/person_mentioned* and all knew me, and that I was not afraid to go by my self—I did so and meet them some distance from the *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned* and shook hands with several; I told the *person_mentioned*Commendant*/person_mentioned* that the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*here were afraid he had come to kill etc—he told me no that he had Orders from the *person_mentioned*Chief*/person_mentioned* etc to *person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned*, he road on to the *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned* and demanded the guns to be put away etc, the *person_mentioned*Colo*/person_mentioned* before I got to the *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*had meet them, and altho he repeatedly told the *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* to put away the guns, the *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned* were in such confusion that it was for some time before they could be made to know that they would not be Instantly put to death, the armes were Laid away and on (I believe the*date_mentioned n="11-03-1826"> next day)*/date_mentioned* they were taken by *person_mentioned*Delion*/person_mentioned* and put under guard and have since been sent away to await the order of the *person_mentioned*Chief*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Commendant*/person_mentioned* told me that he expect the arms would all be sent back in a few days etc that he would leave some *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*here to guard us untill the thing would be Determined. He took *person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned* of with him *person_mentioned*5 or 6 others*/person_mentioned*—Some times *person_mentioned*Dewitt*/person_mentioned* was told that he was a *person_mentioned*prisoner*/person_mentioned*, and at other times that he was free etc. my strength failes and I am obliged to lie down, my head is like a whirl wind and my friend adiew.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Kerr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Colo S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Sn. Felipe De Austin*/location_mentioned**/p* */div1*
